analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
na hetu sa hetuka duka sa ni dassana ttika

original: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na sa hetukam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu ahetukaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā eka

original: Nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na hetum na ahetukam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu ahetukaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na sa hetukam na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca tīṇi yeva saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na hetum na sa hetukam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu ahetukaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka
